title: Anyone able to open Mac Client?
body:
Title.

I'm currently unable too. Just curious if it's not just me. It says I need to check logs (I'm not smart in Tech/Computers). I do have Wifi still doesn't open. So is anyone else having this issue? {{item:3070}}

replies.body: Na dude I'm in the same issue.. was playing perfectly fine yesterday... about last night it started saying unspecified error but if i restarted the mac and waited a bit it would work.. now it just isnt working. My internets working fine but client just wont open.
Thank you. Your current issue is just like mine. That error pop up is what I'm getting, yet my internet is working perfectly fine. I hope Riot would investigate this.

It's why i switched to pc...

PC for games
Mac For Web and iTunes :D
a rioter needs to see this, this issue is gonna screw with my weekend man.{{item:3070}}
Same as me I try to open the launcher but all I get is the league of legends banner and a message saying "Unspecified error occurred. Please check the logs for more information."
What happens when starting up? Crashes? If so, try installing Java and Updating flash
Same here, i log on this morning and tried to open but it just crashes
